perturbation.original_text: Invoices will be paid within 15 days of receipt.
perturbation.changed_text: Invoices will be paid within 45 days of receipt.
perturbation.explanation: Section 5(a) originally states invoices are to be paid within 15 days of receipt. Changing this to 45 days contradicts the original payment term, creating uncertainty about the actual due date and potentially leading to disputes.

perturbation.original_text: Subject to Section 4 hereof, TrueLink will continue to provide the requested Hosting Services and Support Services until the last day of the month following the month in which Client provides TrueLink with a written notice of its election to terminate this Agreement.
perturbation.changed_text: Subject to Section 4 hereof, TrueLink will continue to provide the requested Hosting Services and Support Services for an additional 90 days after the end of the month in which Client provides TrueLink with a written notice of its election to terminate this Agreement.
perturbation.explanation: Section 14 originally stated TrueLink continues providing services until the end of the month following the notice. Changing this to 90 days after the end of that month creates a contradiction regarding the duration of service provision post-termination notice, leading to potential disputes.

perturbation.original_text: This Agreement shall renew automatically thereafter for successive one year periods until terminated pursuant to Section 12 herein or unless either Client or TrueLink deliver to the other written notice of intent not to renew no later than thirty (30) days prior to the end of said year.
perturbation.changed_text: This Agreement shall renew automatically thereafter for successive one year periods until terminated pursuant to Section 12 herein or unless either Client or TrueLink deliver to the other written notice of intent not to renew no later than fifteen (15) days prior to the end of said year.
perturbation.explanation: Section 13 requires a 30-day notice for non-renewal. Changing this to 15 days creates a contradiction regarding the required notice period for non-renewal, leading to uncertainty and potential disputes over contract continuation.
